alert.note: Alert for Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Forest County through 145 PM CDT... At 121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentuck Lake Campground, or 15 miles east of Eagle River, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Forest County, including the following locations... Alvin, Windsor Dam Campground and Nelma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
